text: The 2000/01 FIS Ski Jumping World Cup was the 22nd World Cup season in ski jumping and the 11th official World Cup season in ski flying. It began in Kuopio, Finland on 24 November 2000 and finished in Planica, Slovenia on 18 March 2001. Lower competitive circuits this season included the Grand Prix and Continental Cup. == Map of world cup hosts == All 17 locations which have been hosting world cup events for men this season. Events in Lillehammer, Ramsau, Engelberg and Liberec were canceled. Oberstdorf hosted ski flying world cup event and four hills tournament. {| |- valign = "top" | {| cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="background:#ffffff; font-size:69%; border:grey solid
